TopicTitle: Map view 'focus' trajectory missing in SOI change

Articles.Content: A really useful feature that I liked in KSP 1 was being able to focus on a celestial body that I'm going to in the map mode, to see what my orbit will look like when I pass through its sphere of influence. It helps me know if I'm going to be passing in front of it, or behind it, which helps with gravity assists. When I try to focus the Mun for example, it doesn't show me the trajectory line, it just shows me that I'm going to be passing through its sphere of influence.
Apparently, according to @ShadowZone's latest video, this is going to be fixed very soon.
